channel.title: CVE Feed for TopQuadrant -- TopBraid EDG
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TopQuadrant -- TopBraid EDG

item.title: CVE-2024-45745|2024-09-27T17:43:27.032Z -- topquadrant -- topbraid%20edg
item.description: TopQuadrant TopBraid EDG before version 8.0.1 allows an authenticated attacker to upload an XML DTD file and execute JavaScript to read local files or access URLs (XXE). Fixed in 8.0.1 (bug fix: TBS-6721).

item.title: CVE-2024-45744|2024-09-27T17:44:33.233Z -- topquadrant -- topbraid%20edg
item.description: TopQuadrant TopBraid EDG stores external credentials insecurely. An authenticated attacker with file system access can read edg-setup.properites and obtain the secret to decrypt external passwords stored in edg-vault.properties. An authenticated attacker could gain file system access using a separate vulnerability such as CVE-2024-45745. At least version 7.1.3 is affected. Version 7.3 adds HashiCorp Vault integration that does not store external passwords locally.

item.title: CVE-2024-45744|2024-09-27T16:37:26.351Z -- topquadrant -- topbraid%20edg
item.description: TopQuadrant TopBraid EDG stores external credentials insecurely. An authenticated attacker with file system access can read edg-setup.properites and obtain the secret to decrypt external passwords stored in edg-vault.properties. An authenticated attacker could gain file system access using a separate vulnerability such as CVE-2024-45745. At least version 7.1.3 is affected. Version 7.3 adds HashiCorp Vault integration that does not store external passwords locally.
